attributes.title: horrible grrrrr 🤬🤬
attributes.review: i downloaded the app expecting a horrible experience and thats exactly what i got! as soon as i opened the app, my phone immediately exploded 😢 i had to buy several new phones but when i downloaded and opened the app on those phones, they exploded as well!! i am now in crippling debt and im writing this review from my frigidaire ffss2615ts 25.5 cu. ft. side by side refrigerator and im living on the streets of LA. hold on,,,, a squirrel is coming guys and im scared of squirrels AHHHHHH

attributes.title: Trash🗑🤢🤮
attributes.review: Right when I opened the app it showed me Donald trumps leaked nudes which almost sent my to the grave⚰️ for how gross🤮 they were. Also after going threw the app I noticed my dog was starting to act funny I went to go check on her and realized she had diarrhea and it was all over the house. She continued to feel sick so I soon realized that this app made my dog sick. If you want to keep your pets healthy don’t download this app. Trump 2020 🧚🏽‍♂️💫💞 in a gravestone⚰️

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: i thought this would be an amazing app that would really help me keep up with the updates of our wonderful presidents’ campaign updates, but i was stunned! it didn’t even allow me to open the app without trying 10 times, because it kept glitching and bringing me back to the home screen. when i finally got in, the buttons wouldn’t press and it was even more itchy!

When I went on this app there was cobwebs and cows all over my screen then the app attracted spiders to crawl all over me 😡😡😡 then lovely peaches showed up to my house💀💀💀 I think it’s highly inappropriate for trump to still have this app up when these terrible things happened because of this app up after these terrible things happened 🤬🤬🤬This year I WILL NOT BE VOTING FOR TRUMP 🤮🤮🤮 I am now locked in lovely peaches basement I hope ur happy 😑🙄🙄🙄

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I read the reviews on this app thinking “Oh it’s just gen z trying to sabotage Trump again” Come to find out its not just gen z. This app is a complete nightmare! When i downloaded it, it asked for my location. So, of course I put my address in. 2 hours later Trumps daughter, Ivanka broke into my house and pushed my grandmother who handicapped! She insulted me and my family the whole day. I will never be using this app ever again!

attributes.title: I was so scared
attributes.review: I thought I would install this and support but it wanted my phone number and I trusted it so when I gave it I received these texts and calls and my phone wouldn’t stop.i tried turning my phone off but it wouldn’t.my phone even started glitching after this and being weird I’m terrified. I can’t keep this app any longer I’m gonna get hacked if I keep it any longer don’t install it😭

attributes.title: I HATED IT
attributes.review: It was all fake news there where pictures of  a rapist/racist on it this app should be removed for supporting such a bad person I think there was also some straights which I do not think is right for my kids to be seeing since I don’t support that kinda live style but it’s okay to be heterophobic they should put some lgbtq+ people because there live style is amazing and right this is just wrong shaking my head 😔

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app with high expectations and i was LET DOWN!!! i would expect donald to have a better app but it was TRASH! there were so many bugs and i think they stole my personal information! when i told my son, donald, named after our great president he told me that they should get “anonymous” to help them with the coding. i have no idea who this gentleman is but maybe donald should go to him for help because his app is not great AT ALL!

attributes.title: Read all terms and privacy conditions!!!
attributes.review: My aunt Karen asked me to download the app and text the number. As a trump supporter I trusted my information to be protected by the Trump committee and without hesitation I accepted the terms & conditions without reading them. We are now being bombarded by “scam likely” calls and our emails are filled with inappropriate bots. Thankful most go straight to spam mail but I’m still receiving emails and calls. 0/5 stars.

attributes.title: The WORST App I’ve ever used
attributes.review: I do not recommend downloading this app. It crashes constantly! I’ve had to restart my phone 4 times because every time I open the app it completely freezes it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! I was so excited to download this app and see what glorious middle age, backwards thinking wonders awaited me inside, but unfortunately I’ll never be able to find out. I’d give it zero stars if I could but alas, one star it is 👎
